summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting assistance in delivering bank subpoena returns related to the Epstein case to a case agent. The email references the 2018 SDNY investigation and indicates the records are from FirstBank Puerto Rico.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, requesting assistance in delivering bank subpoena returns from FirstBank Puerto Rico for the Epstein investigation to a case agent.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: The AUSA is requesting M's assistance in coordinating the delivery of bank subpoena returns, indicating a professional working relationship.

events.title: SDNY Investigation into Epstein
events.description: Reference to the 2018 Southern District of New York investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Request for Bank Subpoena Returns Delivery
events.description: An AUSA emails a request for assistance in delivering recent bank subpoena returns from FirstBank Puerto Rico to the Epstein case agent.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a 2020 email from an SDNY AUSA regarding the Epstein case.
It references bank subpoena returns from FirstBank Puerto Rico as part of the investigation.
The request involves delivering these records to a case agent at 1 Saint Andrew's Plaza.
It confirms ongoing investigative activity related to financial records in the Epstein case as of June 2020.
The file path indicates the records are part of the '2018 SDNY investigation' into Epstein.
